name: Wedding
description: A romantic garden wedding in a stunning venue with lush greenery and beautiful flowers. This wedding package includes a full day of celebration, a gourmet dinner, and a live band. Create lasting memories in a magical setting.

name: Birthday Party
description: Throw a surprise party for your loved one's 30th birthday with cake, music, and fun. Our birthday bash package includes party planning, decorations, and a DJ to keep the party going all night.

name: Anniversary
description: Celebrate 25 years of love with a glamorous silver anniversary party. Our anniversary package includes a grand banquet hall, a five-course meal, and live entertainment for you and your guests to enjoy.

name: Engagement Party
description: Host a cozy rustic-themed engagement party with friends and family. Our engagement soiree package offers rustic decor, catering, and a photo booth to capture memorable moments.

name: Retirement Party
description: Bid farewell to a colleague with a lighthearted retirement roast and heartfelt toasts. Our retirement party package includes venue rental, catering, and a roastmaster to keep the laughter rolling.

name: Baby Shower
description: Celebrate the upcoming arrival of a little one with a whimsical baby shower filled with joy. Our baby shower package includes games, decorations, and a dessert bar for a sweet time.
